mapper.select: SELECT teaching_target.`target_name`,teaching_target.`content`,indicator_target.`support_rate`,indicator_target.`weight`,indicator_target.`year` FROM indicators LEFT JOIN indicator_target ON indicators.`indicator_id`=indicator_target.`indicator_id` LEFT JOIN teaching_target ON indicator_target.`target_id`=teaching_target.`target_id` WHERE indicators.`indicator_name` LIKE #{indicatorName}
